\documentclass[english]{article}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[latin9]{inputenc}

\usepackage{babel}

\begin{document}
\begin{center}
\textsf{\textbf{\Large Cp}}
\par\end{center}{\Large \par}

\textsf{\textbf{Description:}}

Copy SOURCE to DEST.

\textsf{\textbf{Arguments:}}

-h, shows this help 

-u, shows version and author 

-i, prompt before overwrite 

-r, -R, copy directories recursively 

-v, explain what is being done;

\textsf{\textbf{Usage:}}

cp {[}OPTION] SOURCE DEST

\textsf{\textbf{Author:}}

Moraru Ionut

\textsf{\textbf{Version:}}

1.0.3
\end{document}
